wordGroup: incidence rate 发生率，发病率
incidence angle 入射角，迎角；安装角
normal incidence 正入射；垂直入射；法线入射
incidence of a disease 发病率
grazing incidence 掠入射；切线入射；临界入射
glancing incidence 掠入射；切线入射

sentences.en: The incidence of breast cancer increases with age.
sentences.cn: 乳腺癌的发病率随着年龄的增长而上升。

sentences.en: Incidence of the disease is fairly evenly spread across Europe.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病的发生率在欧洲各地相当平均。

sentences.en: Authentic Italian cooking is very healthy—witness the low incidence of heart disease in Italy.
sentences.cn: 正宗的意大利烹饪对健康非常有益，在意大利心脏病发病率低就是证据。
